message: You've been caught and neutralized by the corporations. Game Over.
Your deeds have become legendary. You have inspired a revolution against the tech overlords.
You've become the master of the digital realm, and no system can stand against you.
Without resources, you're forced into hiding and retire from the hacking world.
Betrayals have cost you dearly. You can trust no one, and no one trusts you. The city is no longer safe for you.
The boundary between man and machine is lost. You've become a fully integrated AI, leaving behind what remained of your humanity.
Your failures are widely broadcasted, making it impossible to continue your quest.
